scripts.build: npm run dist && storybook build && npm run add-lint-exclusions
scripts.dist: node build.js base build styles_theme styles_storybook styles_editor styles_admin styles_layout styles_variables styles_stories sdc_base assets constants
scripts.dist:watch: node build.js base build styles_theme styles_storybook styles_editor styles_admin styles_layout styles_variables styles_stories sdc_base assets constants watch
scripts.postinstall: npm run uikit-install && npm run build
scripts.storybook-dev: npm run dist && node build.js cli "dist:watch" "storybook"
scripts.uikit-install: rm -Rf components > /dev/null 2>&1 && ([ -d "node_modules/@civictheme/uikit/packages/sdc/components" ] && cp -R node_modules/@civictheme/uikit/packages/sdc/components components || ([ -d "node_modules/@civictheme/sdc/components" ] && cp -R node_modules/@civictheme/sdc/components components || (echo "Error: No components directory found" && exit 1)))
